TopicTitle: How do I add screenshots to a post?

Articles.Content:
Hi again,

I'm feeling pretty stupid today. How do you add screenshots to a post? I don't have an Imgur account and don't plan on making one so I can't use a link. Kind regards,

Second Hand Rocket Science, Chairman and Founder of Acorn Aeronautics Incorporated.

Imgur allows uploading and linking to images without any account.

Happy landings!

2 minutes ago, Second Hand Rocket Science said:

I don't have an Imgur account and don't plan on making one so I can't use a link.

You have to upload the image somewhere else and paste a link to it in your post. If you prefer not to use Imgur, you'll have to find another similar site that you don't mind.

1 minute ago, Starhawk said:

Imgur allows uploading and linking to images without any account.

Happy landings!

Sorry, I hadn't looked into this! I'll use a link from Imgur. Thanks, mate!

Founder and Chairman of Acorn Aeronautics Incorporated, Second Hand Rocket Science

I like to use Cubeupload because it is only an image uploader, it is pretty easy to create an account, I think (yes, unfortunately it does require that you create an account), and it seems more painfully-slow-internet friendly. Just use whatever works best for you, and I hope you have a great experience on this forum!
